alert.note: Alert for Chester (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 15 at 1:51PM EDT until April 15 at 2:15PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mount Holly NJ has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Chester County in southeastern Pennsylvania... * Until 215 PM EDT. * At 151 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Kemblesville, or 7 miles northwest of Newark, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. * Locations impacted include... Coatesville, Kennett Square, Parkesburg, West Grove, Marshallton, Kemblesville, Landenberg, South Coatesville, Avondale, Modena and Toughkenamon. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
